section.title: Additional sample configuration files
section.para: Files in this section can be found in /etc/nova.

section.title: api-paste.ini
section.para: The Compute service stores its API configuration settings in the api-paste.ini file.

section.title: policy.json
section.para: The policy.json file defines additional access controls that apply to the Compute service.

section.title: rootwrap.conf
section.para: The rootwrap.conf file defines configuration values used by the rootwrap script when the Compute service needs to escalate its privileges to those of the root user.
